message.content:
cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.NI, cs.DS, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the design and analysis of linear codes for reliable communication across noisy channels, which is a core topic in information theory (cs.IT). The codes are also used for stabilizing unstable plants across noisy channels, which falls under the category of control systems (cs.SY). The paper proposes a decoding algorithm with low complexity, which is relevant to the field of networked control systems (cs.NI). The paper also discusses the tradeoffs between communication resources and control performance, which is a topic in data science (cs.DS) and machine learning (cs.LG).
